snippet: Evacuations were ordered for more than 20,000 homes in Southern California as a high-pressure system brought unseasonable heat and gusty winds.
abstract: Wildfire roaring through Southern California forces evacuation orders for more than 20,000 homes, as a high-pressure system brings unseasonable heat and gusty winds to the state.
lead_paragraph: Evacuations were ordered for more than 20,000 homes in Southern California as a high-pressure system brought unseasonable heat and gusty winds.
